comment.author: 63500750@N06
comment._content:
Is there any possibility that these photos could be scanned individually? These are all rarely seen photos of the 1929 Northrop Avion undergoing flight tests. It is difficult to see what going on with such a small scan. 

Anyway, thank you for posting this group of photos!

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/63500750@N06] email me at arenga@sdasm.org and I can provide you with scans.
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
